title: math/big: improve assembly cores: alignment and unrolling
body:
Suggestions from Torbj√∂rn Granlund (personal e-mail):

"Aligning:

  Consider aligning loops to at least a 0 mod 16 address.
  Same for function start.

Tail code after unrolling:

  Setting up a loop which runs 0-3 iterations is quite expensive.
  It should be better to follow the pattern:

        test $2, Rcount
        je       skip2
        restore CF
        [do two "iterations"]
        save CF
      skip2:
        test $2, Rcount
        je       skip1
        restore CF
        [do one "iteration"]
      skip1:
        [footer]
"
